channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- postTabs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- postTabs

item.title: CVE-2022-1781|2024-08-03T00:16:59.892Z -- unknown -- posttabs
item.description: The postTabs WordPress plugin through 2.10.6 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack, which also lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping
